page.title: 19SURVEY OF NORTH STREET
page.content: As you walk down North Street keep to the footpath because there is a lot of traffic. There are 16 non-food shops, 8 restaurants, 7 building societies, a garden centre a library and a fire station. The{FIRE STATION}has four fire engines. There is a training tower. The firemen's outfits are next to the fire engines. When there is a fire the firemen slide down the pole, take off their shoes and jump in their boots. { HORNCHURCH BRANCH LIBRARY}has a {wide range }of books. It has a children's section and an adult's section. Upstairs there is a record section and a place for students to study. The entrance hall usually has an art exhibition. You are allowed to borrow three books for three weeks.
